Module com.um_project_golf
Package com.um_project_golf.Game.GameUtils.FieldManager

Class EntitiesManager

java.lang.Object
com.um_project_golf.Game.GameUtils.FieldManager.EntitiesManager
public class EntitiesManager extends Object
The entities manager class. This class is responsible for managing the entities of the game. Stores the entities of the game.
